com.room4me.xml
Class Node

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.room4me.xml.Node
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CDATANode, CommentNode, DocumentTypeNode, NakedTextNode, ProcessingInstructionNode, TagNode
public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable

This class represents a simple XML node. A Node can have child nodes, have a parent, have siblings, and contain text data. This is the super class of all other nodes.

Author:
Frank Font (mrfont@room4me.com)
See Also:
SmallXMLParser

Node

public Node(java.lang.String sName)
     throws MalformedXMLException
Creates a node with the specified name.
Parameters:
sName - Name of this node. e.g., For XML tag <a b='x' c='y'> the name is "a".
Throws:
MalformedXMLException - when attribute syntax is bad.

getChildNodes

public java.util.ArrayList getChildNodes()
Returns all the child nodes as an ArrayList object. Order of XML document is preserved.
Returns:
Returns the ordered collection of all children for this node. Each child is a Node object.

getChildNodes

public java.util.ArrayList getChildNodes(long nFilter)
Returns all the child nodes as an ArrayList object. Order of XML document is preserved.
Parameters:
nFilter - Summation of NodeFilter members to restrict the returned content. For no filtering, pass value of 0. (For example, to only get TagNodes children, pass in NodeFilter.TagNode as parameter.)
Returns:
Returns the ordered collection of all children matching the filter criteria for this node. Each child is a Node object.
See Also:
NodeFilter

addChildNode

public void addChildNode(Node oNode)
Appropriately adds a child node to the collection and sets the parent of the node.
Parameters:
oNode - Adds this node to the collection of children.

getLevel

public int getLevel()
Returns the nesting level of this node.
Returns:
The nesting level of this node in the document object model. Root level is value 0, next is 1 and so on.
